thread.title: Long Island Rail Road Train Derails in Brooklyn, Officials Say
thread.title_full: Long Island Rail Road Train Derails in Brooklyn, Officials Say

title: Long Island Rail Road Train Derails in Brooklyn, Officials Say

organizations.name: long island rail road train derails
officials say long island rail road train derails

text:
Long Island Rail Road Train Derails in Brooklyn, Officials Say By Trevor Kapp | January 4, 2017 8:47am Twitter Facebook Email More 
BROOKLYN — A Long Island Rail Road train derailed at Atlantic Terminal Wednesday morning, officials said. 
Emergency crews were responding to the area near Atlantic and Flatbush avenues, the Office of Emergency Management said. . @MTA LIRR train derailment: emergency personnel/traffic & transit delays/road closures near Atlantic Ave & Flatbush Ave, BK — NYCEM - Notify NYC (@NotifyNYC) January 4, 2017 
It was unclear if anyone was hurt. 
Check back for updates .
